BB 2nSo running an Open license Google OS will be prone to malwareHypothetically speakingHere is how BB QNX Car OS and Cylance Smart Antivirus can help plug this hole for HuaweiBlackBerry QNX Car OS adapted to become the new Huawei smartphone OS Runs the Google Open license Malware will be prevented by Cylance QNX can block any infiltration to the smartphone The unintended consequences of this is the Huawei smartphone will be more Secured and Trusted than any other Google phones and iPhone

blackberryqnxcomenproduAdditionally to support Android for infotainment the platform is architected to run Android in a guest virtual machine VM This architecture enables support for Google Automotive Services as well as any Android applications that automakers wish to include in their production systems To mitigate potential Android vulnerabilities security measures have been implemented to prevent the direct exchange of data between Android and critical systems and networks such as the Controller Area Network CAN The significance of the BB QNX Car OS is that you can run unsecured Google apps in the VM regardless of the version of Google OS in the VMWhy is this interesting and significant for Huawei smartphoneHuawei is barred from the latest version of Google but not from the Open License of Google OSThe Open license essentially is an older version of Google OS than every other licensee gets You dont get the latest security update and features 1n
